name: North Star Aviation
about: North Star Aviation, located at Minnesota State University, Mankato, is a premier flight training institution and full-service Fixed Base Operator (FBO). We provide exceptional flight training as part of the university's four-year aviation degree program, utilizing state-of-the-art aircraft and simulators. Our experienced flight instructors offer personalized attention to ensure students gain the necessary knowledge and skills for successful aviation careers. North Star Aviation also offers comprehensive FBO services, including maintenance and repair, avionics, and fuel services. With a commitment to safety and excellence, we prepare students for professional aviation careers and support the broader aviation community with our extensive resources and friendly, knowledgeable staff. North Star Aviation is dedicated to guiding and inspiring the next generation of aviation professionals.
